My advisors inform me that [stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName] has been overheard questioning my loyalty to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. When I summon [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHim], [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] is apologetic, but a raised eyebrow tells of [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] doubt. "It's just a rumor, my [Root.GetLordLady]... You are not overly interested in [Root.GetReligiousRite], but you could surely quote any passage of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] without hesitation...?"

As I began reciting [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], [stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName]'s eyes widened. I intentionally focused on what I believed to be [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] favorite passage, speaking clearly to [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] interests as a [stubborn_courtier.GetEducationRole]. My gambit seems to have paid off because the deep bow [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] bestowed upon me was nothing short of embarrassment and an eagerness to make up for [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] obvious blunder.

As I rack my brain for the appropriate lines to shove triumphantly in [stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName]'s face, my palms grow sweaty.\n"Ezekiel 25:17! I will carry out great vengeance on them..." I begin. Then a slow panic begins to rise within my chest. [stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName] frowns. \n"No, wait, that doesn't seem right. That's not..." I mumble as [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] shakes [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] head and with a roll of [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] eyes walks away, leaving me alone with my failure. By the damnation of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName], how did I get this so wrong?

I make it clear to [stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName] that it seems almost heretical for someone supposedly well-versed in [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] to display such a poor understanding of the relationship between a ruler and [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].\n[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName] clearly did not expect to have their own religious understanding challenged, and I try not to smile to myself as [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] sputters an apology. As [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] prepares to leave, I remind [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHim] that many questions can be dangerous to ask.

My voice must not have sounded as threatening as I believed it to. When I told [stubborn_courtier.GetTitledFirstName] how it could be dangerous to ask the wrong questions, [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] only laughed. As I followed up with stories of other unfortunate souls who had questioned their liege's faith, [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] grin remained. When [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] finally departed, it was with an even more disconcerting sentence. "I know exactly where my soul belongs, but I am unsure about yours."

[concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName] has come to me as a friend, to inquire about my wellbeing. "I feel as though I never see you pray anymore, is something heavy burdening your mind?" [concerned_friend.GetSheHe] asks.\nI think of my true beliefs, and how they need to be kept secret, even of those closest to me.

I regale [concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName] with tales of my "dark dreams" of strange and foreign rituals. [concerned_friend.GetSheHeCap] can barely believe the vividness with which I describe the faith of the unbelievers. Afterwards [concerned_friend.GetSheHe] offers me a listening ear for whenever I may be burdened like this again.\nIf only [concerned_friend.GetSheHe] knew.

As I describe my "dark dreams," [concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName]'s expression grows ever more concerned. "You recall these dreams very well," [concerned_friend.GetSheHe] says. "Almost more like memories."\n[concerned_friend.GetFirstName] doesn't comment on it again, but later you worry that you may have made [concerned_friend.GetHerHim] more worried, not less.

I tried to reassure [concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName] that everything is as it should, and soon enough we were conversing and laughing like we used to. When the evening was over, [concerned_friend.GetFirstName] looked me in the eyes. "It is good to see that all is well with you after all."

I tried to reassure [concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName] that everything is as it should, but my mind would not stay still. Did they already know the truth about my faith? As our conversation drifted onto theology, I briskly told [concerned_friend.GetHerHim] that I had to retire for the evening. I barely said goodbye before I had them escorted out.

We have all been created in order to die", I proclaim in front of the Sky God's followers. They nod eagerly, swallowing my lines with a warrior's thirst. They do not know that it is [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] that fuels my passion. Seeing their faces as I continue my speech, I am not sure it matters.

I grab one of the torches of the ground and lift it high above my head. "The Creator watches, even in the night, when all seems dark..." I begin. Even though my heart has abandoned this faith, seeing their faces lit by the flame, I realize the power my words hold for them. They depend on me, their [Root.GetTitle] to guide them through their hardships. If it's their [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] or [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] by my side, I am not sure it matters.

As I walk up the steps, I begin to fidget. I turn to look at my people, only to find their eyes wary. Even the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] shoots me a suspicious glance, and I inhale sharply. A carved horse's head, which I used to find beautiful, glares at me and I find myself averting my eyes. Isn't [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] a vengeful god? The beautiful temple suddenly feels far too crowded and I decide to burst out of the building, leaving the worshipers confused.

I strew the flowers around the altar, while the worshipers murmur at my presence. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] shoots me a suspicious glance and I take a deep breath, averting her eyes. The ancestral spirits can be vengeful, can they not? And why is it so warm here? The place suddenly feels far too crowded. Before I say anything at all, I hastily withdraw of the stage, leaving the worshipers confused.

I make sure that I am regularly seen studying [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].\nToday my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName] came to me to compliment my efforts!

I have arranged for my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName] to help me with readings of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. [Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName] commented that such a studiousness is evidence of a true faithful!

In my efforts to blend in with the believers around me, I believe I have come to learn more [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] theology than most of them know themselves.\nThey would be foolish to challenge my understanding of the faith.
A group of courtiers spotted me praying today. As they came within earshot I made sure to mutter the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] repeatedly.\nThey ended up joining me in my prayer.

I passed by a beggar in the street today and quoted a passage of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] to her, loud enough for anyone passing by to hear. Apparently the exchange became quite the conversation starter at court!

I was studying copied pages of [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] with a fellow faithful when a servant entered my room unannounced. He apologized, but glanced across the scattered pages on my table... Both my companion and I let out a sigh of relief when the servant – in obvious illiteracy – complimented our dedication to the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] faith.

[fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName] has offered to travel to my [Root.Capital.GetCapitalHolding] to support me in my secret ceremony. "For a fellow [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]", [fellow_member.GetSheHe] writes. While I consider my response, I place the letter onto the hearth. As the flames crumple the paper, I rest my hand on the pocket where I keep my hidden [Root.GetSRTrinketSymbol], safe, and away from prying eyes.

[fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName] has offered to support me in my secret ceremony. "For a fellow [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]", [fellow_member.GetSheHe] writes. While I consider my response, I place the letter onto the hearth. As the flames crumple the paper, I rest my hand on the pocket where I keep my hidden [Root.GetSRTrinketSymbol], safe, and away from prying eyes.

I light the candles, while [fellow_member.GetFirstName], in a low voice, begins to sing a haunting melody. I bow my head, deciding resolutely that I am a true [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent] and this will not change. [fellow_member.GetFirstName] echoes my thoughts, when [fellow_member.GetSheHe] finally speaks: "This ceremony is as much for [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], as it is for us". I nod, and we join hands in prayer.

I light the candles, while [fellow_member.GetFirstName] begins to sing quietly, a haunting melody, in reverence to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. I close my eyes, in relief, over being able to practice my faith and to say the words of prayer without judgment. I look over to [fellow_member.GetFirstName], who is still singing, and I smile. Kinship such as this, is a gift.

I lit the candles, while [fellow_member.GetFirstName] began to sing quietly, a wistful melody, full of longing. I've never seen [fellow_member.GetHerHim] so solemn before, and I was struck by the admiration that welled up in me. By [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], I and [fellow_member.GetFirstName]? What was I thinking? I shook my head, trying to focus on the ceremony – in my heart, something flickered to life.

I lit the candles, while [fellow_member.GetFirstName] began to sing quietly, a wistful melody. I swear by [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], I almost dropped the fire I was holding, as [fellow_member.GetHerHis] voice struck a brilliant chord in me. It was so beautiful – the hymn, and the [fellow_member.GetManWoman] performing it. I shook my head, trying to focus on the ceremony. In my heart, something flickered to life.

[fellow_member.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. I close my eyes as we join hands and bow our heads before the holy symbols on the wall. Performing a secret ceremony, in a secret chamber, I should be nervous, or excited. Or... something. I don't feel much at all? Yet [fellow_member.GetFirstName] turns to me afterwards. "Thank you, [Root.GetSisterBrother]. I needed this."

[fellow_member.GetFirstName] lights the candles, as I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. Hidden in this secret chamber, I can still hear the sounds of people outside. This had all seemed so clever before – now I am wondering if it is worth the risk of being discovered. I sigh and squeeze my pendant tightly, ignoring the rolling eyes of [fellow_member.GetFirstName].

[fellow_member.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. I close my eyes as we join hands and bow our heads before the holy symbols, the ones I usually keep hidden behind heavy curtains. This is how it should be – for a moment, all I can hear is the sound of my own breathing, and I feel... safe.

[fellow_member.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. I close my eyes as we join hands and bow our heads before the holy symbols – the ones I usually keep hidden behind heavy curtains. For a moment, all I can hear is the sound of my own breathing, and I feel... safe. "One day, we'll be free", [fellow_member.GetFirstName] says.

[fellow_member.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer. To my surprise, [fellow_member.GetFirstName] takes my hand – the faint light of the room reflected only in [fellow_member.GetHerHis] eyes, and the holy symbol hanging from a pendant around [fellow_member.GetHerHis] neck. "We're supposed to be praying", I mumble and let go, still feeling the warmth of [fellow_member.GetHerHis] hand on my skin.

[fellow_member.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer. I close my eyes as we join hands and bow our heads before the holy symbols – the ones I usually keep hidden behind heavy curtains. I have not felt this relaxed in months. When I open my eyes, I find [fellow_member.GetFirstName] averting [fellow_member.GetHerHis] gaze from me, blushing.

I had just lit the candles when [unfortunate_interrupter.GetTitledName] walked in on us. [unfortunate_interrupter.GetSheHeCap] gasped at the sight of our foreign ceremony, but before [unfortunate_interrupter.GetSheHe] had time to alert the guards, [fellow_member.GetFirstName] tackled [unfortunate_interrupter.GetHerHim]. The [unfortunate_interrupter.GetManWoman] must've hit [unfortunate_interrupter.GetHerHis] head on something though – when the blood started pouring onto the floor, [fellow_member.GetFirstName] backed away in horror.
